website_summaries.verdict: Giving your sugar glider a whole apple is a treat worth getting excited about, especially since it may take a little while to eat the whole thing, but it’s an inexpensive and nutritious snack that’s fun to share with your little pal.
pros: A pair of cored, dehydrated, and peeled apples
No preservatives, additives, or flavorings added
cons: Feed these whole apples to your sugar gliders sparingly, as this is a fairly large treat

customer_reviews.title: USED to be dehydrated papaya ONLY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item before and ingredients were: dehydrated papaya. It also stated it was made in the USA. It now has a number of ingredients including coloring and sugar...and is now a product of Thailand. Will be returning. It's ashame because my hamster loved the regular old "papaya" only UPDATE: couldn't be returned so BEWARE if you think you are buying natural fruit...it isn't and you'll be stuck with product and out $5+
customer_reviews.author: True Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: An absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: I buy these treats for my chinchilla. For the longest time, he was obsessed with rose hips and raisins. I found this item in a pet store (in the bird section) and decided to give it a try, since they were all out of my chinchilla's usual treats. Funnily enough, my parakeets won't eat anything besides pellets, seeds, and millet, so they were completely uninterested. My chinchilla though, absolutely LOVES THEM. He's actually spit out raisins at me before because he wants his papaya instead. Now, I order online to save me the trouble, and my chinchilla does backflips inside his cage whenever he sees me reach for them.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Variety!
customer_reviews.text: From time to time I make up guinea pig treat bags with hay, a few little treats and these. I also mix some of these with their regular pellet food from time to time. The treat bags (plain brown paper lunch bags) keep the busy & gives them something constructive to do. It also entertains both them and me when I kinda crumple up the open part of the bag so they have to do a little 'problem solving' to figure out how to get to those yummy treats! Don't worry, both smart piggy's figure it out within 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: MSBornFLRaised

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described
customer_reviews.text: This item is not as described by the seller. The listing specifically says "No Additives, Preservatives Or Flavorings" and under ingredients it lists only "dehydrated papaya". I bought two because that was what I was looking for. Once received, the ingredients show: papaya, cane sugar, citric acid, calcium chloride, artificial color FD&C Yellow #5 & #6, sulfur dioxide (preservative). This listing needs to be changed to represent what the buyer is actually getting. These are now useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley N

customer_reviews.title: Rabbits love it
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits love these treats. They are a good value and nutritious supplement to their diet
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Not a Favorite for my Piggies
customer_reviews.text: These treats were an excellent price, so I figured I would see if my piggies like them. They are very picky about what they like and when introduced to their new treat they did not show much interest. After a few hours, I checked their cage and the treats were gone, so I guess they liked them well enough. These are worth a try to see if your piggies may like them!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and small
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would get my Guinea pigs weight up in his old age, but he won't eat them, and neither will his cage mate. The package was also smaller than anticipated. Shipping time was good and I have other animals to try it on. It really does say the only ingredients are dehydrated apples. I won't be buying it again though, especially for how much it costs.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

customer_reviews.title: Bunny goes bananas for these papaya treats!
customer_reviews.text: Papaya is so good for bunnies tummies and it is so expensive to get papaya tablets. I am so happy that I found these yummy treats that are natural and inepensive. He alwaYs binkies when I shake the bag so I know he is satisfied with its taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: My rabbits seem to like most of these
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits seem to like most of these, there is a few they seem to like better then others. Great for the price, will most likely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Danyel

customer_reviews.title: Should be soft not crunchy...
customer_reviews.text: I used to get these at pet stores and can no longer find them there. Great treat for rabbits every one in a while. They used to be soft like dried apples, but these are all crunchy feeling like they are stale. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: rats don't like them so much
customer_reviews.text: The rats aren't really a fan of these at all, they take them and them spit them out, I've only seen them eat them after a very long time of them sitting there.
customer_reviews.author: Asta

customer_reviews.title: No love from our chinchilla
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good to me, but our chinchilla tried one or two then wouldn't touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Bumble Love

customer_reviews.title: He loves these.
customer_reviews.text: These never last long. Our rabbit can't get enough of these.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Glikman

customer_reviews.title: My bunnies love them.
customer_reviews.text: This is the treat of choice for both my bunnies. They go absolutely crazy when they so much as even hear me get the bag out.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Snacks for your chinchilla
customer_reviews.text: Great treats for chinchillas. Likes every variety in this pouch. Sometimes he'll leave one out of other foods ha.
customer_reviews.author: Monica/Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Better than the pet store
customer_reviews.text: Better quality and better price than what I can get at my local pet store. Always a bunny favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves these treats! So much better than real apple which has more water content and is digesitvely challenging for my little bunz.
customer_reviews.author: The Shanester

customer_reviews.text: This is my rabbits favorite treat, she really liked it when I gave it to her. All rabbits are different so I'm glad I found what she prefers.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Bad Apples
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten Peter's Nature Apple Treats for my chinchillas before but they have never looked or smelled this horrible. I cant give these to them. They look rotten. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I have six chinchillas
customer_reviews.text: My Chinchillas love these papaya pieces. The only downfall is that there aren't very many in the package. So therefore, I wont probably buy often, because of the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: My rat hates this food. He actually sorts through ...
customer_reviews.text: My rat hates this food. He actually sorts through and pulls this out of the bowl or pulls the food he likes out and leaves these in it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could find these in a bigger bag
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Loose food in box
customer_reviews.text: Contents of the package was open and there was loose treats all in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cross

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.text: These have sugar in them, that is not okay and dangerous for small animals
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hanke

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My guniea pig liked these, but didn't go too crazy about them.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentShopper

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product was pale and looked very different from the previous orders and my pet refuses to eat it. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DTay2003

customer_reviews.title: Great treat!
customer_reviews.text: My hamster Oreo loves these! He stuffs his little jaws full.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer koontz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our Syrian Hamster loves this mix! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters
customer_reviews.text: They eat them sometime not much but my baby's that are 3 weeks old are trying really hard to eat them.. So they are ok
customer_reviews.author: sabine jones

customer_reviews.title: Guinea Pigs FAVORITE!
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying the apple pellets for my 2 pigs. These are one of the only treats they will eat since they are very picky. They absolutely love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My rats love these! Although I feel they're a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: My rats love these! Although I feel they're a bit too much sugar. Once in a while type of treat!
customer_reviews.author: Candice chapman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Guinea pigs love these. Tried other apple treats, these are the best, doesn't feel fake/weird like some alternative treats.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P Koza

customer_reviews.title: this is terrible I am so disgusted with all of these items ...
customer_reviews.text: this is terrible I am so disgusted with all of these items if I could get my money back I would . joe gately
customer_reviews.author: joe gately

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loves them, and he is a picky eater
customer_reviews.author: Dan Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Nobunny linked it.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, no bunny liked it, and no guinea pig either, for that matter. They're just dried apples, so it was a ridiculous price as well. If your pet happens to like dried apples, head to a natural foods store, and get some there. You'll have enough money left to get yourself some too.
customer_reviews.author: JenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat for lil' critters!
customer_reviews.text: Papaya treats are a favorite with my pet mouse Daisy. She highly recomends this item. The papaya treats arrived in good condition. The Amazon price is about same as I'd pay in local pet shops. I'd buy Peter's papaya goodies again.
customer_reviews.author: W. WATTERS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit LOVES the papaya! I use it to litter train her and every time I clean her litter she runs back into it because she knows she will get her treat. I give her one a day every time that I put the new litter in and it lasts me about two months
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: nice yummy treat
customer_reviews.text: perfect little size for a hamster. Got these on a subscribe and save and could not beat the price. Will definitely will purchase again and recommend to anyone wanting a little treat for a hamster.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Ligman

customer_reviews.title: Peter's Nature Treats for Small Animals, Banana Pieces
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loved these! The small pieces make it easier to give more treats throughout the day, as opposed to the large banana slices.
customer_reviews.author: mbsS

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Our Hamster loves Peter's Nature Treats. We have purchased several variety's and she always grabs the treats before anything else.
customer_reviews.author: K. Langan

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves them. :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dwarf hoto, she loves them. She prefers the apple slices, but she liked the banana as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Rabbits love this!
customer_reviews.text: My two rabbits absolutely love this tasty treat!! They hear the bag crinkle and come running! They are so cute when they beg for treats!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi B

customer_reviews.title: Great treat!
customer_reviews.text: I got a few types of treats to see what my guinea pigs like and this is one of them. They always purr when I give them these Apple pellets. I will buy them again since even my pickiest guinea pig loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great rabbit treat
customer_reviews.text: My lop rabbits love these treats. I use these when I train the to jump hurtles. Nice amount in the bag, small maneagable chunks.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treat for my bunny!
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves, loves, loves her treats and this has got to be her very favorite of all! So easy to order it from Amazon than to run down to the local "Big Store" pet store and tiny pet stores don't stock it! Want a special treat for your pet rabbit? Watch them eat these up; it must be like candy to a child!
customer_reviews.author: S. Maki

customer_reviews.title: My bunnies LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: The bunnies go CRAZY for these treats! I usually add a few to their daily lettuce for a bit of crunch.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love the product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this treat for any small animal. It lasts long and pets love it. Worth the buy and the wait :)
customer_reviews.author: JadeEmpire143

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves fresh apple -- and she just loved these as a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Our rabbit's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: Our rabbit goes bonkers over these! We only give him a small piece every day as a reward for getting back in his cage, but he never gets tired of these.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for Guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: These apples are my piggies favorite treats. They only get them a couple times a week, but boy do they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

product_meta.title: Peters Nature Treats
product_meta.description: Color:Whole ApplPeter's nature treats are the 100-percent natural fruit treats with no additives, preservatives or flavorings. Great for rabbits, chinchillas, mice, rats, hampsters, guinea pigs and more.
